entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Mount Carleton (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny in the afternoon. High minus 2. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
